queryText: search index=*ind* group="group 0" user_agent=Mozilla*Windows* | eval lat_long=latitude+longitude | timechart span=15m max(lat_long) as latlong | append [search index=*ind* user_agent=Mozilla*Mac* | eval latPercent = round((latitude*100)/http_status,2) | eval longPercent = round((longitude*100)/http_status,2) | eval latencyPercent = round((latency*100)/http_status,2) | timechart span=15m max(latPercent) as MaxLatPercent] | append [search index="ind-0" city=boston group="group 0" address!=null user_agent=Mozilla* | eval hobby_http = hobby+"@"+http_method+user_agent | sort 0 timestamp | streamstats current=false last(latency) as last_latency by hobby_http | eval latency_rate_of_change = if(latency>last_latency, round((latency - last_latency)/900,2), 0) | timechart span=15m sum(latency_rate_of_change) as latency_rate_persec] | append [search index=ind-0 city="boston" group="group 0" hobby!="Acting" AND hobby!="Karate" user_agent=Mozilla*Windows* | timechart span=15m sum(latency) as queued_latency]
